eg.ui

Class EditArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.ui.EditArea

  • public final class EditArea
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the panel that contains the text area for editing text and the area that displays line numbers.

    The usual shortcuts for cut, copy, paste and select text are disabled

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EditArea(boolean isWordwrap, boolean isLineNumbers, java.lang.String font, int fontSize) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets this JPanel which contains the text area for editing text and the text area that shows line numbers

      Disables wordwrap and makes the area that displays line numbers visible if the specified boolean lineNumbers is true

      Enables wordwrap.
      boolean isWordwrap()
      Returns the boolane that true if wordwrap is enabled

    • Constructor Detail

      • EditArea

        public EditArea(boolean isWordwrap,
                boolean isLineNumbers,
                java.lang.String font,
                int fontSize)
        Parameters:
        isWordwrap - the boolean that is true to enable, false to disable wordwrap
        isLineNumbers - the boolean that is true to show, false to hide line numbers. This is effectless if isWordwrap is true.
        font - the name of the initial font
        fontSize - the size of the initial font

        public javax.swing.JPanel content()
        Gets this JPanel which contains the text area for editing text and the text area that shows line numbers

      • lineNrWidth

        public LineNrWidthAdaptable lineNrWidth()
        Gets this implemented method that is specified in LineNrWidthAdaptable
        Returns:
        the implemented method

      • enableWordwrap

        public void enableWordwrap()
        Enables wordwrap. Invoking this method also hides the area that displays line numbers

      • disableWordwrap

        public void disableWordwrap(boolean lineNumbers)
        Disables wordwrap and makes the area that displays line numbers visible if the specified boolean lineNumbers is true
        Parameters:
        lineNumbers - the boolean value

      • isWordwrap

        public boolean isWordwrap()
        Returns the boolane that true if wordwrap is enabled
        Returns:
        the boolean value

      • showLineNumbers

        public void showLineNumbers(boolean b)
        Shows or hides the area that displays line numbers
        Parameters:
        b - the boolean value that is true to show line numnbers
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if b is true and wordwrap is currently enabled

      • setFont

        public void setFont(java.lang.String font,
                    int fontSize)
        Sets the font
        Parameters:
        font - the name of the font
        fontSize - the font size

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the text content in this text area to a printer
